content: Placement Day - Indian Institute of Technology Hyderabad celebrates ‘Placement Day’ to felicitate the young, dynamic, enthusiastic and aspiring students with the “Excellence Award” for their significant contribution to the placement and internship activities and procedures, performed under the Office of Career Services of IITH.
Placement Day - They are honorably designated as ‘Student Placement Coordinator’ and ‘Student Internship Coordinator’, marking them as bearing greater responsibility and integrity and dedication.
Placement Day - We appreciate and thank the students for their efforts and valuable contribution in an exceptional way which fostered the success of the Institute in getting maximum companies.
